title: NAGchi Cares
description: 終わることのないエポックのグローバルコミュニティにおいて、意味のある参加のための条件を定義し創造することは、時間を超越しています。

f6_assessments.q0:
There is no real plan in this proposal on what will be delivered or how it will be delivered.
Quasar has proposed or co-proposed a number of other project with little details and/or funding requests such as:
Pharo ACM - $1
dRisk - $5
Proof of Insurance - no details
communitybond.io Integrate- no details
Community Bond -Loyalty Rewards - no details
Community Bond - Metadata - no details
Trade Finance and Credit Insurance - minimal details
Endangered Language Preservation - no details
Locating Culture - no details
NAGchi - no details
NAGchi Cares - no details
f6_assessments.q1: Please provide a plan so that it can be evaluated. As it stands, there is not plan so it cannot be implemented successfully. Given the widely varying experience quoted for Quasar in all the other proposal submitted, some evidence should be provided
f6_assessments.q2: No timeline or clear deliverables have been mentioned thus making it hard to audit. The proposer has not defined what success would be.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement and the solution is very general. "encourage interaction through careful gaming"? What do you mean exactly? It seems you had idea but didn't find time to make a detailed plan. So please come in the next Fund of Catalyst
f6_assessments.q2: There is neither detailed plan nor any metrics how to track this very general idea

f6_assessments.q0:
There is no clarity in the problem statement.

There is no plan, the proposal is just a draft, and there is not enough information to assess impact. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document Proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q1:
There is information about the team but without an associated plan there is no way to assess the team's qualification for the proposal.

The proposal is just a draft, and there is not enough information to assess feasibility. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document Proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no plan, the proposal is just a draft, and there is not enough information to assess auditability. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document Proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal does not signify anything. While the proposers might think this is okay with the relatively "low" amounts of funds asked, for other people this is a lot of money. And some other groups actually do something well-planned on a similar budget.
f6_assessments.q1: No plan is presented. I am not sure about the experience if the proposers, but this proposal does not indicate the willingness to implement something concrete.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided is not sufficient.

f6_assessments.q0:
-	The proposal does not describe a detailed problem that identifies the needs of the challenge.

-	The proposal does not articulate clearly how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem

-	There are no metrics or goals that align with the outlined challenge settings 

-	The proposal is not specific about how is able to scale to address future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1:
-	The proposer mention relevant skills and experience of the team in charge of the proposal but not provide references or links for check that information.

-	 The proposer does not provide a budget clearly outline and broken down into identifiable items.

-	The proposer does not provide a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows not only what is being done but also how.

-	The plan does not describe the resources necessary to implement the proposal. 

-	The proposal does not clearly explain technical aspects like architecture, language and tecnologies if they are crucial for implementation

-	The proposer has not considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2:
-	The proposal  does not present a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement.

-	The proposer does not present metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal was submitted with almost identical information to a different challenge with a similar title. NONE of the proposals hold any information that helps us asses this proposal. The only information here is claimed experience and no real plan.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal was submitted with almost identical information to a different challenge with a similar title. NONE of the proposals hold any information that helps us asses this proposal. The only information here is claimed experience and no real plan. "its growing" under detailed plan section.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal was submitted with almost identical information to a different challenge with a similar title. NONE of the proposals hold any information that helps us asses this proposal. The only information here is claimed experience and no real plan.

solution: 丁寧にゲームをすることで交流を深める。
experience: 工学から芸術、起業家から企業まで、様々なバックグラウンドを持つカルダノのメンバーによるVeteraチーム。
